actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to authorize and direct the President of the United States to allocate chemical fertilizers until September 1, 1975.

summary.text: Directs the President of the United States to allocate chemical fertilizers until September 1, 1975, by means of a mandatory program authorized under this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize and direct the President of the United States to allocate chemical fertilizers until September 1, 1975.
